text: Hi guys, so again welcome to the volume profiling course, module one. This is what the index is going to look like for module one. As you can see it comprises of four parts. Part one, we're going to start off and talk about why 95% of traders lose money. Why professional traders use volume profiling? What is volume profiling? The future of volume profiling is a tool. and objective versus subjective analysis. In part two we're going to move on and talk about key market participants, time frame participants and the trading auction process. Part three then we will talk about the volume profile as a trading tool, volume profile metrics and then the argument between traditional value area versus volume value areas. The process of trading with volume profiling, the basic volume profile trade setup, choosing your volume profile software provider and then setting up profiles using trading technology charts and then the rules to succeed in the trading arena. As you can see, it's quite a big overview of volume profiling, but once you complete all four parts, you'll have a very good understanding of the basic concept of volume
